description: Creates a security profile. For information about security profiles, see Security Profiles in the Amazon Connect Administrator Guide. For a mapping of the API name and user interface name of the security profile permissions, see List of security profile permissions.

parameters.name: SecurityProfileName
parameters.description: The name of the security profile.

parameters.name: Permissions
parameters.description: Permissions assigned to the security profile. For a list of valid permissions, see List of security profile permissions. (string) ---

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource. For example, { 'Tags': {'key1':'value1', 'key2':'value2'} }. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: AllowedAccessControlTags
parameters.description: The list of tags that a security profile uses to restrict access to resources in Amazon Connect. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: TagRestrictedResources
parameters.description: The list of resources that a security profile applies tag restrictions to in Amazon Connect. For a list of Amazon Connect resources that you can tag, see Add tags to resources in Amazon Connect in the Amazon Connect Administrator Guide. (string) ---

parameters.name: Applications
parameters.description: A list of third-party applications that the security profile will give access to. (dict) --- This API is in preview release for Amazon Connect and is subject to change. A third-party application's metadata. Namespace (string) --- Namespace of the application that you want to give access to. ApplicationPermissions (list) --- The permissions that the agent is granted on the application. Only the ACCESS permission is supported. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Namespace
nested_params.description: Namespace of the application that you want to give access to.

nested_params.name: ApplicationPermissions
nested_params.description: The permissions that the agent is granted on the application. Only the ACCESS permission is supported.

parameters.name: HierarchyRestrictedResources
parameters.description: The list of resources that a security profile applies hierarchy restrictions to in Amazon Connect. Following are acceptable ResourceNames: User. (string) ---

nested_items.name: SecurityProfileId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the security profle.

nested_items.name: SecurityProfileArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the security profile.
